attributes.additional_details: Ofcom shouldn't be allowed to auction off frequencies and bands to the highest bidders for the LTE coverage. This could potentially lose millions of pounds for the economy over companies losing customers. It should be split fairly so every phone and every user gets the opportunity. I feel it is completely wrong that phone giants such as O2 and Vodafone should miss out. I therefore create an epetition to oppose Ofcoms decision and hand the frequencies to all companies instea of using it to gain money!
